Description:
Great area, great home, great buy!
In the very heart of Cranbourne, in one of the most sought-after areas, this extremely well maintained and presented 12-year-old one owner family home is in one of the better wide open streets. Set on a functional 579 m2 and located walking distance to the Cranbourne train station, a choice of primary and secondary schools, Hunt club shopping Centre, restaurants and cafes, medical centres and pharmacy, sporting venues and an abundance of open space and family friendly parks.
If you want a light filled home that offers space and comfort and just everything and at a realistic price then an inspection will not disappoint.
2 distinct Living areas gives all the family the privacy they need. There are 3 robed bedrooms including the super-sized Master with a walk-in robe and full ensuite to compliment the family bathroom and a separate 2nd toilet. Fully ducted central heating and a split system for cooling ensures your year-round total comfort. 12 Solar panels in place. The timeless clever design has no wasted space and still offers the open plan (with 2 living separated living rooms) and a well fitted kitchen as the hub of the home. Ceramic tiles and neutral tone carpets and paint finishes will make this home attractive to all.
If you are looking for the perfect home to entertain in then this property offers you the functional kitchen as the hub overlooking the dining area and opening through sliding glass doors to a super large Alfresco area with easy removable shade sails. A generous sized family laundry with external access completes the picture.
The low maintenance gardens Front and rear have been designed to ensure security and privacy for the family and maximise the use of the substantial space with lots of kid friendly lawn areas. A larger than normal double garage (remote door) with full rear access to the yard as well as a good size garden shed makes for comfortable living.
If you are in the market for a true family home with offers everything as well as 2 separate living rooms or just a superior investment property, then this much-loved home is your opportunity.
